articles.content: SoftBanks $50bn flotation of Arm is more than five times oversubscribed, according to bankers pitching investors on the biggest initial public offering in nearly two years, as the UK-based chip desig… [+5378 chars]

articles.author: Alex Lennane
articles.title: 'It's messed up', says Flexport's Petersen as he 'fires' 75 new staff live on Twitter - theloadstar.com
articles.description: Flexport's founder fires new appointments over Twitter in a race to cut costs as fallout from Dave Clark's exit continues.
articles.content:
Flexport certainly knows how to cause a stir. If the news about what looks certain now to be the sacking of stooge Dave Clark wasnt enough, there is more to come.
